net.sf.jclal.core

Interface IClassifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassifier, MulanClassifier, WekaClassifier, WekaComitteClassifier

    public interface IClassifier
    Interface for the classifiers to be used in the framework. The framework allows to integrate several types of classifiers.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
